name: MoolMantar
0:
”Alexa, start mool mantar”
”Alexa, open mool mantar”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: mool mantar
Developer Terms of Use
des:
The Mool Mantar is the first hymn in the Guru Granth Sahib, the holy scripture of the Sikhs.

To start, just say "Alexa, start mool mantar" or "Alexa, open mool mantar". At anytime, you can stop the radio by saying "Alexa, stop"
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
